name: Book of Skulls
description: The Book of Skulls is a Normal Mode Magic Weapon dropped by Skeletron or found in his Treasure Bag with a 10% / 33% chance. When used, it shoots a skull that advances, leaving a trail of flames in its wake. The skull doesn't bounce off blocks, it disappears if it hits one, it emits a bit of light, and it can go through a single monster (it disappears after hitting the second one).
